prompt: I need a toy product for this characters

structured_prompt.short_description: A collectible action figure set featuring two distinct characters, one with a cool, serene blue aesthetic and the other with a fierce, intense red aesthetic. The figures are posed dynamically, ready for action, and displayed in a clear, stylized packaging that highlights their contrasting designs and features. The packaging includes a vibrant backdrop that further emphasizes their individual themes.

objects.description: An action figure representing the blue-themed character. It has spiky, light blue hair, a calm yet determined expression, and intricate markings on its face and body. The figure is highly detailed with articulated joints, allowing for various poses.
objects.relationship: Part of a two-figure set, contrasting with the red-themed figure.
objects.appearance_details: Features a stylized, anime-inspired design with sharp lines and glowing blue accents.
objects.pose: dynamic, mid-action stance with one arm slightly raised
objects.clothing: stylized dark blue and black armor-like attire

objects.description: An action figure representing the red-themed character. It has wild, spiky red hair, an aggressive and intense expression, and prominent scar-like markings on its face. The figure is also highly detailed with articulated joints, designed to complement the blue-themed figure.
objects.relationship: Part of a two-figure set, contrasting with the blue-themed figure.
objects.appearance_details: Features a stylized, anime-inspired design with sharp lines and dark, intense accents.
objects.pose: dynamic, aggressive stance with fists clenched
objects.clothing: stylized dark red and black armor-like attire

objects.description: A clear plastic display box, designed to hold both action figures. It has a sleek, modern design with minimal branding to allow the figures to be the focal point.
objects.relationship: Contains and displays both action figures.
objects.appearance_details: Features a split design, with one side having a blue tint and the other a red tint, mirroring the characters.

lighting.shadows: soft, minimal shadows to highlight product details

aesthetics.composition: symmetrical, with two main subjects balanced on either side of a central vertical line, creating a strong visual contrast. Product shot composition.

structured_prompt.context: This is a product photograph for a collectible action figure set, intended for e-commerce websites, toy catalogs, or promotional materials.
